mapper.update:
update book
ISBN = #{isbn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
press = #{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
press_time = #{pressTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
page_number = #{pageNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
src = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pricing = #{pricing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update book set ISBN = #{isbn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, press = #{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, press_time = #{pressTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, page_number = #{pageNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, src = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pricing = #{pricing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pricingunit = #{pricingunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_number = #{sellerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_type2 = #{bookType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_type1 = #{bookType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_type_name2 = #{bookTypeName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_type_name1 = #{bookTypeName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, professional_type1 = #{professionalType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, professional_type2 = #{professionalType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, professional_type_name1 = #{professionalTypeName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, professional_type_name2 = #{professionalTypeName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userable_num = #{userableNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_num = #{useNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_num = #{preNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_u = #{cU,jdbcType=INTEGER}, print_user = #{printUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_t = #{cT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, print_time = #{printTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, import_user = #{importUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, import_time = #{importTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, export_user = #{exportUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, export_time = #{exportTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE 1=1 AND professional_type1 = #{professionalType1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND professional_type2 = #{professionalType2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ISBN = #{isbn} AND press LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{press}),'%') AND book_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{bookName}),'%') AND author LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{author}),'%') AND professional_type_name1 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{professionalTypeName1}),'%') AND professional_type_name2 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{professionalTypeName2}),'%') ORDER BY use_num desc limit 10

SELECT count(*) FROM book WHERE 1=1 AND professional_type1 = #{professionalType1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND professional_type2 = #{professionalType2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ISBN = #{isbn} AND press LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{press}),'%') AND book_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{bookName}),'%') AND author LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{author}),'%') AND professional_type_name1 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{professionalTypeName1}),'%') AND professional_type_name2 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{professionalTypeName2}),'%')
